about_the_game:
The Echo Whispers has finished in the TOP 5 of the PJP Game Jam and it was made in 72 hours. Now the story is bigger with more details.

Synopsis

Amy isolates herself in a small cabin in order to regain her sanity, she just didn't imagine being alone with herself was the problem. Help Amy overcome what even she doesn't know.

The Gameplay

This game is primarily a first-person narrative walking simulator with tasks and exploration mechanics.

Key Features

  • PS1 style aesthetic with camera filters;
  • Secret tapes with hidden story details;
  • Dialogues;
  • Voice acting full generated by AI.

short_description: The Echo Whispers is a psychological horror experience that takes you to the shattering of expectations and a surprising outcome. In this game, you are Amy and you are alone with yourself, which is much scarier than being alone without you.
